documents.document: ðŸ™ðŸ˜·ðŸ”œðŸ™‚ðŸºâ›‘ (or: ðŸ™ was healed by ðŸº) So Jenna the ðŸº healed Tracy the ðŸ™'s wounds.
ðŸ™ðŸ™ðŸ˜‰ðŸ‘ðŸº (or: ðŸº was thanked by ðŸ™) Well, Tracy the ðŸ™ thanked Jenna the ðŸº effusively.
Then Jenna the ðŸº fell deeper in love with Tracy the ðŸ™ than she ever had with Tina Fey
ðŸ™ðŸŽ­ðŸ”ðŸº (or: ðŸ™ impersonated ðŸº) But Tracy the ðŸ™ did a very good impersonation of Jenna the ðŸº.
Then Tracy the ðŸ™ was better at singing on TV shows than Jenna the ðŸº and thoroughly upstaged her
So Jenna the ðŸº sued Tracy the ðŸ™ for damages inflicted when starring in comedies
ðŸ™ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜âœŒâœŒðŸ˜ðŸ˜ ðŸº (or: ðŸ™ settled with ðŸº) Well, Tracy the ðŸ™ reached a settlement with Jenna the ðŸº.
ðŸºðŸš¶ðŸ˜ðŸ‘‹ðŸ—‘ðŸ˜ŸðŸ™ (or: ðŸº dumped ðŸ™) "We're through" said Jenna the shallow ðŸº to Tracy the self-centered ðŸ™.
ðŸ™ðŸ˜”ðŸ˜§â¤ðŸ”œðŸº (or: ðŸ™ pined for ðŸº) But Tracy the ðŸ™ yearned to be with Jenna the ðŸº again.
ðŸ™ðŸ‘ðŸ”›ðŸº (or: ðŸ™ monitored ðŸº) So Tracy the ðŸ™ monitored every aspect of Jenna the ðŸº's life.
Then Tracy the ðŸ™ rescued Jenna the ðŸº from an attack with a bra catapult by Jenna Maroney
ðŸºðŸ™ðŸ˜‰ðŸ‘ðŸ™ (or: ðŸ™ was thanked by ðŸº) So Jenna the ðŸº thanked Tracy the ðŸ™ effusively.
Then Jenna the ðŸº married Tracy the ðŸ™ in Rockerfeller Center and they honeymooned in Rockerfeller Center
ðŸºðŸ¤’ðŸ™ðŸŒ¡ðŸ”¥ðŸ“‹ðŸ’Š (or: ðŸº was diagnosed by ðŸ™) After this, Tracy the ðŸ™ diagnosed Jenna the ðŸº's ailments.
So Jenna the ðŸº trusted Tracy the ðŸ™'s reasons for starring in comedies
ðŸ™âš›âš—ðŸ”›ðŸº (or: ðŸ™ experimented on ðŸº) But Tracy the ðŸ™ experimented on Jenna the ðŸº without permission.
ðŸ™âž¡ðŸºðŸ’¢ (or: ðŸº was hurt by ðŸ™) So Tracy the ðŸ™ really hurt Jenna the ðŸº.
Well, Jenna the ðŸº murderously bombarded Tracy the ðŸ™ with her bra catapult
So in the end Jenna the ðŸº was arrested for fatally knocking over Tracy the ðŸ™ with her bra catapult
How will Jenna the ðŸº fare in prison amongst the other violent inmates? The End

If clothes maketh the man, wouldn't wearing #AlbusDumbledore's tassel hat and half-moon spectacles make #LanceArmstrong honester?
Opportunistic billionaires like George Soros put me in mind of musicians like Madonna: they're as opportunistic as people in free enterprise systems
Have you heard about the sorceress who took cooking lessons, became a chef and went from creating rotten zombies to creating fresh salads?
ðŸšª. Develop an aesthetic ðŸ‘‹. Become an artist ðŸ’’. Marry a wag in your genre ðŸ’ž. Create witty painting together ðŸ’”. Succumb to cynicism too https://t.co/9OX8WrStEE
Most jesters are goofy, but others are as 'goofy' as Doomsday
I learn a lot about the world from the questions people ask Google E.g., "Why do lions have heavily muscled forelimbs?" #ShitThatHumansSay
Most preachers are distinguished, but others are as 'distinguished' as camouflage clothing in a forest
#Irony: When the protesters that throw quiet stones hold raucous protests. #Quiet=#Raucous #Protester
Hulk hate puny humans who tweet about moaning about men. Hulk smash #BlancheDuBois and the Streetcar Named Desire she rode in on.
Versatile scientists like Doc Emmett Brown put me in mind of computers: they're as versatile as Geoffrey Rush
"I think I'd make a good judge," peeped a wise tortoise. "I know all about law I'll take you under my wing", gibbered an albino gorilla.
The albino gorilla taught the wise tortoise to perform better bigoted judgment. But the tortoise's boss advised "Time to retire".
Uncontrollable scientists like Bruce Banner put me in mind of blazes: they're as uncontrollable as Genghis Khan
Weak is the force in compelling actresses if their expressiveness they lose. Fight change, they will. Boring conservatives will they be. https://t.co/OroBLdWFuX
To lack a goal: This can turn trained nurses into talentless underachievers. #Nurse=#Underachiever
Reclusive fugitives like Edward Snowden put me in mind of ogres: they're as reclusive as Jimmy Hoffa
Artist. noun. An adroit mix of 5 parts ink-using printer to 4 parts entourage-attracting bishop. #Artist=#Bishop #Artist=#Printer
Industrious businessmen like Henry Ford put me in mind of servants: they're as industrious as a strike breaker
What if the story of #PeterPan were about #TweenyMusic? #JustinBieber could be its #PeterPan: youthful yet cocky, and delinquent too.
If #JustinBieber is #PeterPan in skinny jeans, who in the story of #TweenyMusic is #CaptainJamesHook most like?
Fear competes with the anger that leads to hate. Trust enhances the love that competes with hate. Take your pick. #Fear=#Trust?
Most overlords are dominant, but others are as 'dominant' as my toy poodle
Strong is the force in timid newcomers if experience they develop Commit burglary, they will Bold thieves will they be #ThingsYodaNeverSaid
Most magistrates are official, but others are as 'official' as a 3 bill
#Irony: When the insurgents that incite the most supportive rebellions also inspire the most disruptive sympathizers.
Neurotic scientists like Bruce Banner put me in mind of neurotics: they're as neurotic as Woody Allen
#Irony: When the regimes that are controlled by throned kings are managed by exiled monarchs. #Throned=#Exiled #Regime
ðŸŒž. Enter a tournament ðŸŒ¤. Become a competitor ðŸŒ¬. Compete in foolish competition ðŸŒ©. Turn into a blunderer ðŸŒ‚. Lose the tournament #FoolishVenn https://t.co/nUEfwmRyGP
Most rockets are aerodynamic, but others are as 'aerodynamic' as a large shed
I learn a lot about the world from the questions people ask Google E.g., "Why do ionic compounds dissolve in water so easily?"
Most sharks are rugged, but others are as 'rugged' as split bamboo fishing rods
The devout knights that return from their quests will be reborn as irreligious sinners who yield to temptations #ZenOfVenn https://t.co/mkV2gUFwZm
I call this picture "Star". I painted it with sparkling sun-orange, pure apple-red and faded rose-pink. #StarRGB https://t.co/6B4gXdm3uk
Refreshing punks like Sid Vicious put me in mind of peppermint patties: they're as refreshing as glass of milk in the morning
When it comes to the illustrations they make, some illustrators are little better than accusative prosecutors.
Accusative illustrators make blatant illustrations the way prosecutors make accusations. #Illustrator=#Prosecutor #Illustration=#Accusation
Most prizes are valued, but others are as 'valued' as Gigli DVDs
One does not simply walk into a community college and develop a pathology. #ThingsBoromirNeverSaid #CareerAdvice
If you are a would-be patient that isn't willing to be utterly committed to developing a pathology, you may as well be cured of lesions now.
Rigid invalids like Rain Man put me in mind of zombies: they're as rigid as a surfboard
Researcher. noun. A charlatan who would rather make false enquiries than false misrepresentations. #Researcher=#Charlatan
Sex stirs the passions that enhance energy. Lust stirs the passions that enhance energy. Take your pick. #Lust=#Sex?
Most actors like John Wayne are masculine, but others are as 'masculine' as a wet noodle
I call this picture "Cult, Fervent but Controlling". I painted it with fervent fire-orange and controlling IBM-blue. #CultRGB https://t.co/BDi7Oeq5Pk
Most zealots are intense, but others are as 'intense' as a piece of wheat bread
What if #DieHard were real? #AntonioSalieri could be its #HansGruber: educated and sophisticated, but manipulative
#OscarWilde combines the best of #LeoTolstoy and the worst of #MickJagger: He is literary and observant yet also posturing and vain
Suspenseful directors like David Lynch put me in mind of thrillers: they're as suspenseful as wolves circling a wounded calf
I painted this picture of #IndianaJones's innermost soul using educated Cicero-toga-white, dashing Batman-grey and cynical Trump-orange. https://t.co/x1aGBwV9Vs
Impudent sailors like Fletcher Christian put me in mind of urchins: they're as impudent as Lucifer
Helper: A helpful teacher, assisting with a teacher's problems. #Helper=#Teacher
Evaluators perform judgments. Killers inflict the deaths that lead to judgments. Who is better? #Killer=#Evaluator
Most luxuries are desirable, but others are as 'desirable' as an ice delivery in winter
What if a ðŸ‰, who thought it was Jerry Lewis, was expelled by a ðŸ¦ who thought it was Frank Sinatra? #JerryLewis=#FrankSinatra
Frank the ðŸ¦ cared about its reputation and so it remained spotless. #JerryLewis=#FrankSinatra
So at first, Jerry the ðŸ‰ had nothing but respect for Frank the ðŸ¦'s reasons for recording pop songs
ðŸ‰âž¡ðŸ¦ðŸ“ (or: ðŸ‰ was signed by ðŸ¦) So Frank the ðŸ¦ signed Jerry the ðŸ‰ as a client.
Well, Jerry the ðŸ‰ became a student of Frank the ðŸ¦ in the ways of recording pop songs

ðŸ‰ðŸ˜ˆðŸ’¬ðŸ¦ðŸ˜‡ðŸ”€ðŸ˜ˆðŸ¦ (or: ðŸ‰ abetted ðŸ¦) But Jerry the ðŸ‰ abetted Frank the ðŸ¦ in its crimes.
Well, Jerry the ðŸ‰ facilitated Frank the ðŸ¦'s forays into recording pop songs
ðŸ¦ðŸ‘ðŸš«ðŸ‰ðŸ‰ðŸ™‹ (or: ðŸ‰ was overlooked by ðŸ¦) But Frank the ðŸ¦ hardly noticed Jerry the ðŸ‰ at all.
So Jerry the ðŸ‰ broke with Frank the ðŸ¦ over the best way of singing middle-of-the-road songs
ðŸ¦ðŸ˜ŒðŸ’¬ðŸ‰ðŸ˜¡ðŸ”œðŸ˜ (or: ðŸ¦ appeased ðŸ‰) Well, Frank the ðŸ¦ sought to appease Jerry the ðŸ‰.
ðŸ‰ðŸ»ðŸ¦ (or: ðŸ‰ drank with ðŸ¦) So Jerry the ðŸ‰ went drinking with Frank the ðŸ¦.
ðŸ¦ðŸ•µðŸ”œðŸ˜¨ðŸ‘ˆðŸ‰ðŸ‘€ (or: ðŸ¦ was uncovered by ðŸ‰) Then Jerry the ðŸ‰ uncovered Frank the ðŸ¦'s dirty little secret.
ðŸ¦ðŸ‘â“ðŸ‘Žâž¡ðŸ‰ (or: ðŸ¦ was judged by ðŸ‰) After this, Jerry the ðŸ‰ judged Frank the ðŸ¦ and found it wanting.
So Jerry the ðŸ‰ realized Frank the ðŸ¦ was bipolar, aggressive and vindictive, and was disillusioned by him
Then Jerry the ðŸ‰ had proof of illegality when Frank the ðŸ¦ was starring in romantic comedies, and blackmailed him
ðŸ¦ðŸš«ðŸ’µâœ‹ðŸ‰ (or: ðŸ¦ withheld payment from ðŸ‰) But Frank the ðŸ¦ withheld due payment from Jerry the ðŸ‰.
So Jerry the ðŸ‰ betrayed all of Frank the ðŸ¦'s confidences to his rival, Tony Bennet
So in the end Frank the ðŸ¦ forced Jerry the ðŸ‰ out of The Rat Pack But it is often harder to forgive than to lash out. The End

Cheap actors like Ed Wood put me in mind of perks: they're as cheap as a fast food joint
Last night I dreamt I was a stonemason, carving carvings. What does this mean? #Carving
Well, to dream that you are carving some meat indicates that you are trying to rid yourself of certain feelings. #Carving
"I fear I'm becoming a tyrant," cawed a nasty crow. "As you haven't inherited an empire of your own," peeped a minnow, "let's share mine".
So the minnow helped the nasty crow to commit pitiable terror. That is how the nasty crow became a wretch. #Tyrant=#Wretch
Most jaguars are exciting, but others are as 'exciting' as a funeral
